Impediments: Image enhancement model output blurry for low-light radiology images
Backend API returning slow responses during image enhancement inference
Action Taken: Enabled model warm‑loading and optimized CUDA batch size

Impediments: Clinical summary generation occasionally missing key symptoms from clinician notes
Action Taken: Improved text preprocessing and added medical keyword extraction

Impediments: ICD‑10 code prediction giving low‑confidence outputs for multi‑disease cases
Action Taken: Added confidence thresholding and fallback multi‑label classification rule

Impediments: Frontend UI failing to display enhanced images due to incorrect base64 formatting
Action Taken: Fixed decoder handling and updated API response structure

Impediments: Users reporting long wait time when summary + ICD‑10 tasks run together
Action Taken: Separated tasks into async workers using queue-based processing

Impediments: Deployment build failing because of incompatible Python dependency versions
Action Taken: Pinned stable versions and rebuilt using isolated virtual environment

Impediments: Doctors unable to upload large DICOM files on UI
Action Taken: Increased upload size limit and implemented progressive uploading
